entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: The snake that nearly killed Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who saved his life by pulling the Deluminator out of his pocket.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is concerned about their safety and wants to know how Ron found them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who was saved by Ron.

entities.name: deluminator
entities.description: A small silver object that can turn lights on and off.

relationships.description: Ron saved Harry's life by pulling the Deluminator out of his pocket.
Hermione is interested in knowing how Ron found them and wants to know more about the Deluminator.
Ron possesses the Deluminator, which he used to save Harry's life.
Harry is concerned that Hermione did not hear him when he said Ron saved his life.
